Token.Abstract: A proxy layer that sits between the video player and a Virtuoso-managed (video) asset
Creates a local HTTP proxy on a random port using the specified asset

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: A VirtuosoAsset object to base streamed playback from. The server will use the internal data from the VirtuosoAsset to dynamically contruct the playback URL for the player.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A started (running VirtuosoClientHTTPServer object. Returns nil if the VirtuosoAsset is outside its availability window, is expired, or if the VirtuosoDownloadEngine instance is outside its Backplane communications window. If this method returns nil, it also sends errors via NSNotificationCenter indicating the problem.

Token.Abstract: Creates a local HTTP proxy on the specified port using the specified asset

Parameter.Name: port
Parameter.Abstract: The local port to open with the localhost server

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: A VirtuosoAsset object to base streamed playback from. The server will use the internal data from the VirtuosoAsset to dynamically contruct the playback URL for the player.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A started (running VirtuosoClientHTTPServer object. Returns nil if the VirtuosoAsset is outside its availability window, is expired, or if the VirtuosoDownloadEngine instance is outside its Backplane communications window. If this method returns nil, it also sends errors via NSNotificationCenter indicating the problem.

Token.Abstract: Shuts down a running proxy instance
Restarts a previously shutdown proxy instance. Does nothing if the receiver is already running.
Indicates whether the receiver is currently running.
Indicates whether the receiver is currently running.
Indicates whether the receiver is currently running.
The dynamically-generated playback URL string. Pass this URL to a video player for playback
